Clubs

One of the best things about Amateur Radio is the opportunity to join various clubs and societies, whether local or national, or even international.

I am part of a number of clubs, and I have listed these below, with links to their websites.


I am a founding member of the Glasgow University Wireless Society and am pleased to currently serve as its Chairman.


GMDX - I am pleased to serve as Secretary of the GMDX Group


WACRAL - the World Association of Christian Radio Amateurs and Listeners - No. 1730


RSGB - the Radio Society of Great Britain - No. 211957


CRA - the Colchester Radio Amateurs


HARIG - the Harwich Amateur Radio Interest Group


ECWARC - Essex CW Amateur Radio Club - No. 254


G-QRP - the Q-QRP Low Power Club - No. 17163


FISTS - FISTS CW Club - No. 21280


WoSARS - the West of Scotland Amateur Radio Society


SKCC - the Straight Key Century Club - No. 27020


OARC - the Online Amateur Radio Community
